price: 91. So (it was)! And We knew all about him (Dhul-Qarnain).
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَۖ وَقَدۡ أَحَطۡنَا بِمَا لَدَيۡهِ خُبۡرٗا

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: kadhālika waqad aḥaṭnā bimā ladayhi khub'ran
